column9: External memory relative address - divided by 8
Number of 128B chunks of data to read (exp+mantissas)
Number of native vectors to process
Number of UGD vectors to process on left
Number of UGD vectors to process on the right
Number of native vectors per UGD vector

[0] left mantissa 4 bits (otherwise 8)
[1] right mantissa 4 bits (otherwise 8)
[2] main loop over left (otherwise right)
[7:3] reserved
